Uses of DBusSignal in org.bluez.v3
 

Subclasses of DBusSignal in org.bluez.v3
static class Adapter.BondingCreated
          Signals that a successful bonding has been created.
static class Adapter.BondingRemoved
          Signals that a bonding was removed.
static class Adapter.DiscoverableTimeoutChanged
          After changing the discoverable timeout this signal provide the new timeout value.
static class Adapter.DiscoveryCompleted
          This signal indicates that a device discovery procedure has been completed.
static class Adapter.DiscoveryStarted
          This signal indicates that a device discovery procedure has been started.
static class Adapter.MinorClassChanged
          After changing the minor class with SetMinorClass this signal will provide the new class value.
static class Adapter.ModeChanged
          If the current mode is changed with SetMode this signal will inform about the new mode.
static class Adapter.NameChanged
          After changing the local adapter name with SetName this signal will provide the new name.
static class Adapter.PeriodicDiscoveryStarted
          This signal indicates that a periodic discovery procedure has been started.
static class Adapter.PeriodicDiscoveryStopped
          This signal indicates that a periodic discovery procedure has been completed.
static class Adapter.RemoteAliasChanged
          After changing an alias with SetRemoteAlias this signal will indicate the new alias.
static class Adapter.RemoteAliasCleared
          After removing an alias with ClearRemoteAlias this signal will indicate that the alias is no longer valid.
static class Adapter.RemoteClassUpdated
          This signal will be send every time the remote class of device has been changed.
static class Adapter.RemoteDeviceConnected
          This signal will be send if a low level connection between two devices has been created.
static class Adapter.RemoteDeviceDisappeared
          This signal will be send when an inquiry session for a periodic discovery finishes and previously found devices are no longer in range or visible.
static class Adapter.RemoteDeviceDisconnected
          This signal will be send if a low level connection between two devices has been terminated.
static class Adapter.RemoteDeviceDisconnectRequested
          This signal will be sent when a low level disconnection to a remote device has been requested.
static class Adapter.RemoteDeviceFound
          This signal will be send every time an inquiry result has been found by the service daemon.
static class Adapter.RemoteIdentifiersUpdated
          This signal is sent to indicate the provided services of a given remote device.
static class Adapter.RemoteNameFailed
          This signal will be sent every time the service daemon tries to resolve a remote and this fails.
static class Adapter.RemoteNameRequested
          This signal will be sent every time the service daemon tries to resolve a remote name during discovery.
static class Adapter.RemoteNameUpdated
          This signal will be send every time the service daemon detect a new name for a remote device.
static class Adapter.TrustAdded
          Sent when SetTrusted() is called.
static class Adapter.TrustRemoved
          Sent when RemoveTrust() is called.
static class Manager.AdapterAdded
          Parameter is object path of added adapter.
static class Manager.AdapterRemoved
          Parameter is object path of removed adapter.
static class Manager.DefaultAdapterChanged
          Parameter is object path of the new default adapter.
static class Manager.ServiceAdded
          Parameter is object path of registered service agent.
static class Manager.ServiceRemoved
          Parameter is object path of unregistered service agent.
static class Service.Started
          The object path of this signal contains which service was started.
static class Service.Stopped
          The object path of this signal contains which service was stopped.
static class Service.TrustAdded
          Sent when SetTrusted() is called.
static class Service.TrustRemoved
          Sent when RemoveTrust() is called.
